message:
2018-12-23

=====Material URLs=====

Video: https://edition.cnn.com/2018/11/19/cnn10/ten-content-tues/index.html

Transcript: http://transcripts.cnn.com/TRANSCRIPTS/1811/20/sn.01.html

오늘의 CNN은 바이오 에너지를 이용해서 쓰레기 처리 문제와 에너지원 확보 문제를 동시에 해결해나간다는 스토리가 인상적입니다.

Today's CNN story about using bioenergy to solve waste disposal problems and energy sources at the same time are impressive.

====Video Contents====

00:00 - 03:40
balance of power in the U.S. Senate and House of Representatives, as Midterm Election results continue to come in.

03:40 - 04:40
An impact crater in beneath Greenland's ice.

04:40 - 09:05
An effort to use biomass pellets to power homes.

09:05 - 10:00
A rarely seen jellyfish.
